TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripSplitButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem

summary.span: 表示下拉列表，左侧标准按钮的组合按钮右侧或如果在相反方向的值是。

span.span: Represents a combination of a standard button on the left and a drop-down button on the right, or the other way around if the value of is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮和下拉按钮的功能相结合。 combines button and drop-down button functionality. 使用属性来同步按钮上显示的项与所选的下拉列表项的事件。Use the property to synchronize the event of the chosen drop-down item with the item shown on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripSplitButton1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripSplitButton1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息处理为引发 ENTER 键和空格键在预处理过程中调用此方法事件。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the event. 但是，如果是未启用，此方法改为调用基类实现。However, if the is not enabled, this method calls the base class implementation instead. 仅当调用此方法方法指示该项未在处理该键。This method is called only if the method indicates that the item is not processing the key.

permission.span: 有关继承的类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

para.span: 重写时方法在派生类中的重写实现应返回以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生的类将很少，如果有过，需要重写此方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
